qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Revenue sources for SaaS are different from those of on-premise software in that the 'perpetual' usage license fee is no longer applicable and clients are charged for only what they have utilized, usually on a periodic basis.
qualitative_analysis.justification: A citação contrasta o modelo de licenciamento perpétuo tradicional com o modelo SaaS baseado em assinatura, destacando a mudança de receita única para pagamentos periódicos recorrentes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: maintenance revenues disappear as well because maintenance activities are now primarily the responsibilities of SaaS vendors
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra a transformação do modelo de negócio onde a manutenção passa a ser responsabilidade do fornecedor SaaS, característica do modelo orientado a serviços.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: This study also highlighted discrepancies in licensing practices between SaaS and traditional on-premise software (e.g., versioning irrelevant)
qualitative_analysis.justification: A irrelevância do versionamento no SaaS indica deployment de versão única, uma característica técnica fundamental deste modelo.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: The choice of open or proprietary file formats, APIs, and plug-in mechanisms can make the difference between failure and success.
qualitative_analysis.justification: A escolha entre formatos e APIs abertas ou proprietárias afeta diretamente a estratégia de plataforma e o crescimento do ecossistema de parceiros.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe: Competing in digital media software industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Moving to the cloud reduced the effort required to check piracy, as Adobe could now easily track their product usage.
qualitative_analysis.justification: A mudança para a nuvem permitiu melhor controle sobre o uso do software, eliminando problemas de pirataria característicos do modelo tradicional de licenciamento.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe: Competing in digital media software industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: This provided the added benefit of protection against licence compliance violations.
qualitative_analysis.justification: O modelo de entrega em nuvem oferece proteção automatizada contra violações de conformidade de licença.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Converting free users to paid subscribers in the SaaS context: The impact of marketing touchpoints, message content, and usage
qualitative_analysis.quote: All new consumers are provided with a free trial for the first 30 days. Once the free trial expires, all downloaded software is suspended for further usage.
qualitative_analysis.justification: O período de teste gratuito com bloqueio temporal representa uma estratégia freemium que restringe o acesso após o período de avaliação.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: On top of the game? The double-edged sword of incorporating social features into freemium products
qualitative_analysis.quote: Developers that wish to release their games on Steam must design their software to be compatible with Steamworks, Valve's proprietary software development kit
qualitative_analysis.justification: A exigência de compatibilidade com Steamworks demonstra restrições técnicas impostas por plataformas proprietárias no mercado de jogos.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Development of service-dominant business model for CAE software industry in Greater China: a case study
qualitative_analysis.quote: tool builders are not willing to adopt public cloud services for molding simulation when there is a concern about design information protection
qualitative_analysis.justification: Preocupações com proteção de informações de design criam barreiras para adoção de serviços em nuvem pública.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Development of service-dominant business model for CAE software industry in Greater China: a case study
qualitative_analysis.quote: design information should be kept in secrecy, and those data is not allowed to disclose in public based on a non-disclosure agreement
qualitative_analysis.justification: Acordos de confidencialidade e restrições de divulgação afetam o modelo de negócio B2B, limitando opções de deployment.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Competition Among Proprietary and Open-Source Software Firms: The Role of Licensing in Strategic Contribution
qualitative_analysis.quote: the GNU General Public License (GPL) is a widely employed open-source license that is considered to be quite restrictive with regard to what a contributor can do with the software
qualitative_analysis.justification: A GPL impõe restrições significativas sobre como contribuidores podem usar e modificar o software, afetando o modelo de negócio open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Competition Among Proprietary and Open-Source Software Firms: The Role of Licensing in Strategic Contribution
qualitative_analysis.quote: the Berkeley Software Distribution (BSD) license, which imposes minimal restrictions on anyone who uses or extends BSD-licensed software
qualitative_analysis.justification: A licença BSD representa um modelo de negócio open source mais permissivo, com menos restrições de uso e extensão.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on Cloud-Based Software Marketing Strategies Using Cloud Marketplace
qualitative_analysis.quote: After purchasing a license through a separate purchase page, it can be used immediately by installing the product in the marketplace and registering the license.
qualitative_analysis.justification: O processo de licenciamento separado do marketplace demonstra integração entre modelos de marketplace e entrega em nuvem.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on Cloud-Based Software Marketing Strategies Using Cloud Marketplace
qualitative_analysis.quote: It is registered in the NAVER Cloud Platform Marketplace in the form of BYOL and charged per virtual processor.
qualitative_analysis.justification: O modelo BYOL (Bring Your Own License) com cobrança por processador virtual representa uma estratégia de precificação baseada em uso.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economics of open source library software: evidences from Indian libraries
qualitative_analysis.quote: As the OSS is available for freely downloadable, there is low product risk for the library. It can be downloaded and have a trial run in the library, besides evaluating all the features
qualitative_analysis.justification: A ausência de restrições de licenciamento e disponibilidade gratuita caracterizam o modelo de negócio open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Synergies between App-Based Car-Related Shared Mobility Services for the Development of More Profitable Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: skilled drivers (on some occasions they are also required to hold a taxi or a VTC license, depending on the service provider and the place where the service is offered)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Requisitos regulatórios de licenciamento de motoristas afetam recursos-chave e operações do modelo de negócio de aplicativos móveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Synergies between App-Based Car-Related Shared Mobility Services for the Development of More Profitable Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: regulatory issues, which differ between countries and even between regions and cities in the same country, and which could complicate the proposition and implementation of the service
qualitative_analysis.justification: Variações regulatórias regionais criam desafios de implementação para modelos de negócio com presença global.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source ERP business model framework
qualitative_analysis.quote: Vendors can also participate in customization, under various licensing arrangements to impose control
qualitative_analysis.justification: Arranjos de licenciamento variados permitem aos fornecedores manter controle sobre customizações, caracterizando modelo híbrido.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source ERP business model framework
qualitative_analysis.quote: commercial (software owned by a for-profit organization but with source code available to user, with for-profit organization retaining copyright) categories
qualitative_analysis.justification: Software comercial com código aberto mas com retenção de copyright representa modelo híbrido entre open source e proprietário.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source ERP business model framework
qualitative_analysis.quote: Another form of hybridization is exhibited by MySQL, offering dual licenses
qualitative_analysis.justification: Licenciamento dual permite oferecer o mesmo software sob diferentes termos, criando múltiplas fontes de receita.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Growth of a platform business model as an entrepreneurial ecosystem and its effects on regional development
qualitative_analysis.quote: The Apple App Store disallows platform customizability, and applications that overlap with existing functions are rejected
qualitative_analysis.justification: Restrições de customização e rejeição de apps sobrepostos demonstram controle rígido da plataforma, criando barreiras de entrada.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Growth of a platform business model as an entrepreneurial ecosystem and its effects on regional development
qualitative_analysis.quote: Apple's App Store and Google Play's Android market have the same level of openness to users, but they have different levels of openness to the supplier
qualitative_analysis.justification: Diferentes níveis de abertura para fornecedores afetam a gestão do ecossistema e estratégias de parceria das plataformas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Developing enterprise social software in China: insights from Mingdao
qualitative_analysis.quote: Mingdao provides API entrance, which is open in public to realize open development. Accessible to other third party software
qualitative_analysis.justification: APIs abertas permitem integração com software de terceiros, criando valor através de um ecossistema de aplicações.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Developing enterprise social software in China: insights from Mingdao
qualitative_analysis.quote: Installed applications are made by a third-party and can be downloaded, such as meeting room preview, notes connector, Sina Weibo, etc.
qualitative_analysis.justification: A disponibilização de aplicações de terceiros caracteriza um modelo de marketplace dentro da plataforma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source - Is it an alternative to intellectual property?
qualitative_analysis.quote: Certain licenses require the user to distribute a modified version of the software only along with the underlying source code. Licenses may also restrict the mingling of modified versions with proprietary softwares
qualitative_analysis.justification: Restrições de distribuição e mistura com software proprietário definem as limitações do modelo de negócio open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source - Is it an alternative to intellectual property?
qualitative_analysis.quote: A 'copyleft license' limits the commercial utilization of software. It requires the derivative works to also be distributed under the same license terms
qualitative_analysis.justification: Licenças copyleft impõem restrições significativas na utilização comercial, afetando estratégias de monetização.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source - Is it an alternative to intellectual property?
qualitative_analysis.quote: The most important difference between the open source license and the proprietary license in this model is that the latter license is not viral and thus does not require the sharing of improvements and modifications back to the community
qualitative_analysis.justification: A natureza não-viral da licença proprietária em modelos duais permite maior controle comercial sobre melhorias.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source - Is it an alternative to intellectual property?
qualitative_analysis.quote: In complying with the contributor's license agreement, he usually losses all control over the use of his creation upon submission. Contributor's agreements often require a royalty free and unrestricted submission
qualitative_analysis.justification: Acordos de contribuição que transferem controle afetam o modelo de participação e governança em projetos open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Commercialization of Composite Software Resulting from Collaborative Research
qualitative_analysis.quote: None of the involved companies was able to buy or license the software of the others, thus prevailing solutions based on sub-contracting, joint ventures and common spin-offs were not acceptable
qualitative_analysis.justification: Restrições de licenciamento entre parceiros forçaram um modelo híbrido alternativo de colaboração.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Commercialization of Composite Software Resulting from Collaborative Research
qualitative_analysis.quote: Each partner committed to maintain the agreed upon APIs developed during the project as well as to provide support for and to keep his SaaS component available and running on his own cost for additional 24 months after the end of the research project
qualitative_analysis.justification: Compromissos de manutenção de APIs e disponibilidade SaaS definem obrigações contratuais que afetam a gestão do ecossistema.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: the license may limit usage of the software in such a way that the licensee cannot resell, modify, or re-rent the software without the permission of the provider
qualitative_analysis.justification: Restrições de licença sobre revenda e modificação criam barreiras de saída e aumentam custos de mudança.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: Firm D had also found that the IT policies of some large-sized customers specifically restricted software renting and/or usage of the software through the public cloud
qualitative_analysis.justification: Políticas de TI corporativas que restringem uso de nuvem pública afetam a prontidão organizacional e adoção do modelo cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: it is challenging or even impossible to move traditionally developed 'packaged' software to the cloud environment
qualitative_analysis.justification: Incompatibilidades arquiteturais criam desafios para fornecedores estabelecidos transitando para modelos cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: at one end of the continuum, platforms grant complementors exclusive rights; i.e. the PaaS provider does not authorize competing C&A, so that those who are licensed are able to make a sufficient return on their investments
qualitative_analysis.justification: Concessão de direitos exclusivos a complementadores influencia investimentos e dinâmica competitiva no ecossistema da plataforma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: development partners would appreciate white space protection (exclusive rights for C&A providers)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Proteção de espaço exclusivo para desenvolvedores afeta decisões de investimento e formação de parcerias na plataforma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on a Decentralized SaaS Business Model
qualitative_analysis.quote: local servers will get some supports from their HQ and pay license fee according to the number of users or usages
qualitative_analysis.justification: Taxa de licença baseada em número de usuários ou uso representa modelo de precificação recorrente típico de SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: not all customers are willing to rent the software through the public cloud, due to security concerns or a low readiness for new technologies
qualitative_analysis.justification: Preocupações de segurança e baixa prontidão tecnológica são barreiras para adoção de SaaS em nuvem pública.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: some customers had an IT policy that did not allow installation of any software outside their own internal data center
qualitative_analysis.justification: Políticas de TI restritivas em empresas criam requisitos específicos que afetam modelos de deployment e receita.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: Google chose to follow a strategy not unlike the one that Microsoft had employed in the 1980s in its relationships with PC makers — Google developed an operating system and licensed it to any and all handset makers. The key difference between Google's Android and Microsoft's DOS and Windows was that Android was open-source and cost the handset manufacturers nothing.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Licenciamento gratuito e open source do Android representa uma estratégia de plataforma móvel que facilita adoção por fabricantes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and the Degree of Openness of Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: computer users are often scared by potential incompatibility between OS and proprietary standards, which may drive out the benefits from network externalities
qualitative_analysis.justification: Incompatibilidades percebidas criam barreiras de adoção e custos de mudança que limitam efeitos de rede.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and the Degree of Openness of Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: Perceived incompatibility may hamper network externalities to unfold if users restrain to adopt OS solutions
qualitative_analysis.justification: Preocupações de compatibilidade afetam a adoção de soluções open source e impedem desenvolvimento de efeitos de rede.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: OSS portfolio × SoftwarePatents is significantly positive
qualitative_analysis.justification: Patentes de software funcionam como mecanismos de proteção estratégica que aumentam valor em modelos de negócio open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: OSS portfolio × SoftwareTrademarks is significantly negative
qualitative_analysis.justification: Marcas registradas têm impacto negativo na comercialização de OSS, possivelmente devido a conflitos com princípios open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy: data-driven analysis of the Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: intellectual property management and protection costs, to prevent opportunistic behaviors from third parties
qualitative_analysis.justification: Custos de gestão de propriedade intelectual são necessários para proteger valor e prevenir comportamentos oportunistas em ecossistemas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open-Source Software Entrepreneurial Business Modelling
qualitative_analysis.quote: The fusion of the two previously mentioned business modelling frameworks was complemented with open-source research knowledge on software licensing [12–13] and business models [4–6].
qualitative_analysis.justification: Conhecimento sobre licenciamento de software é fundamental para o design de modelos de negócio empreendedores open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Even though this revenue stream is mainly non-monetary, there are some open source platforms available on the market. In most cases, the promoting company behind such open source platforms also offers additional services, designed for those platforms which carry a fee
qualitative_analysis.justification: Plataformas open source com serviços adicionais pagos representam modelo híbrido de monetização em PaaS.
